titleStmt.title: The doctrine of the cross, or, The duty of Christian suffering as it is necessary and subservient in order to the obtaining eternal salvation, delivered in a sermon on Matth. 13. 20, 21 / by Richard Stafford.
titleStmt.author: Stafford, Richard, 1663-1703.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
